gruppe.irc

Class StyleItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gruppe.irc.StyleItem

  • public class StyleItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains information about each style. This information is style name (based on the en_US.properties), color, the colors name and the font name.
    Author:
    Anders, Christian and Olaf.
